EmailTemplate.name: 2017_HDAIssue_Aug302017.2017_HDAIssue_Aug30_2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Link to Honeywell Diagnostic Application (HDA) Temporarily Unavailable
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear HDA User,
The link from the Honeywell MyAerospace Portal to the Honeywell Diagnostic Application (HDA) is temporarily unavailable. We are resolving this issue and will let you know the resolution status within a week. In the meantime, HDA is still accessible through the CAMP website <[[https://www.campsystems.com/]]>for those with a CAMP account.
Thank you for your patience, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused.
If you have MyAerospace questions, simply email us with as much information as possible at this email address <[[mailto:myaerospaceportalissue@honeywell.com?subject=MyAerospace%20Portal%20Feedback]]>.
Thank you for your business, Honeywell Aerospace Visit MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
